If you have any questions or concerns about this Statement or the Service, please contact us. Overview ChatGPT-on-WeChat help you deploy your WeChat ChatGPT chat robot in the cloud in two steps! GitHub address of this project: https://github.com/kx-Huang/ChatGPT-on-WeChat Prerequisites To deploy a ChatGPT-on-WeChat community edition service instance, you need to access and create some Alibaba Cloud resources. Therefore, your account must contain permissions for the following resources. Description : this permission is required only when your account is a RAM account. Permission policy name Remarks AliyunECSFullAccess Permissions to manage ECS AliyunVPCFullAccess Permissions to manage a VPC AliyunROSFullAccess Manage permissions for the Resource Orchestration Service (ROS) AliyunComputeNestUserFullAccess Manage user-side permissions for the compute nest service (ComputeNest) Billing instructions The cost of ChatGPT-on-WeChat community edition deployment in computing nest mainly involves: selected vCPU and memory specifications System disk type and capacity Internet bandwidth This service requires ECS instance can access WeChat server from public network. Deployment Architecture This service is deployed on a single ECS instance. The architecture is as follows: Parameter description parameter group parameter items Description Service instance Service instance name No more than 64 characters in length, must start with an English letter, and can contain numbers, English letters, dashes (-), and underscores (_) Region Region where the service instance is deployed Payment type Resource billing type: Pay-As-You-Go and Subscription resource configuration instance type Instance specifications available in the Availability Zone Instance password is 8-30 in length and must contain three items (uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, ()'~! @#$%^& *-+ ={}[]:;,.? Special symbols in) Availability Zone Configuration Availability Zone Zone where the ECS instance is located VPC ID VPC where the resource is located Switch ID Switch where the resource is located Software Configuration OpenAI Api key Api key for OpenAI, required OpenAI Organization ID OpenAI Organization ID, optional ChatGPT trigger keyword In private chat, the message begins with a keyword will trigger an automatic reply. In group chat, the message begins with @ robot will trigger an automatic reply. The keyword can be an empty string, that is, each message in the private chat will trigger an automatic reply, and only "@ robot" in the group chat will trigger an automatic reply Deployment process visit the compute nest ChatGPT-on-WeChat deployment link and fill in the deployment parameters as prompted Select payment type enter instance parameters Fill in the zone and network parameters Fill in software configuration parameters and click Next: Confirm Order Confirm all parameters and estimate price, click Create Now and wait for the service instance deployment to complete After the service instance is deployed, click the instance ID to go to the details page. Log on to the ECS instance according to the instructions in "Use Now" Scan the latest QR code output in the application log and confirm to log in to WeChat desktop wait a few seconds to chat with wechat robot
